title: Microsoft shows off Continuum in new ad
text:
Microsoft shows off Continuum in new ad 
Published By: Neowin.net - Today 
A leaked ad of the Continuum feature shows off Windows 10 Mobile's new capabilities, allowing you to connect a second screen, a keyboard and...
